description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Bacto is a Eat'Em Up game where the player as a white cell will clean the area from bacterial infection by eating and killing nasty bacterias. There are powerups in help for attacks and health. Each level will get more infected and be aware of highly lethal antibiotics. The high score list is shared global with Xbox LIVE Gold.
